tasks.label: kill-courseproject
args: if (Get-Process -Name 'courseProject' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Get-Process -Name 'courseProject' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { try { $_.CloseMainWindow() | Out-Null; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; if (!$_.HasExited) { Stop-Process -Id $_.Id -Force } } catch { } } }
